hints.content:
We can think of subtraction as:

$\maroonD{\text{total}} - \blueE{\text{part}} = \goldE{\text{ part}}$

We can relate subtraction to addition:

$\maroonD{\text{total}} = \blueE{\text{part}} + \goldE{\text{ part}}$

So, we can add $\blueE9$ to $\goldE{72}$ to find the $\maroonD{\text{total}}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/78b3b973042e9cf1707a18b42b4f5a22dd4f9b3f)

question.content:
**What number makes this equation true?**  
*Hint: Use the place value blocks to help solve.*

 [[☃ numeric-input 1]] ${}-  9=72$  

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/f9c7ec7b35c798bdb855bb6c4c5de6d720edec81)
